trans-unit.source: Each property of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" /> class is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of a Windows display element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" /> 類別的每個屬性是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 Windows 顯示項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> or <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes> classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的屬性達成更佳的效能<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens>或<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes>類別，而不是建立新的畫筆或筆刷根據從值<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a parameter value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will create a new brush.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要取得 3d 項目的表面色彩的筆刷，使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性因為它會取得筆刷的已經存在，而呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的參數值與<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>會建立新筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator and the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Drawing.Color.op_Equality%2A>運算子和<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例為了搭配 Windows Form 包含名為按鈕`Button1`。

trans-unit.source: Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's `Click` event.
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼貼到您的表單，並將關聯`Button1_Click`方法按鈕之`Click`事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這是使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為現用視窗的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為現用視窗標題列的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為使用中視窗標題列的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為現用視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為應用程式工作區 (Workspace) 的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為應用程式工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式工作區是多重文件檢視中沒有被文件佔領的區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，3-D 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的反白色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，3-D 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，3-D 項目的表面色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，3-D 項目的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至背對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為 3D 項目的深色陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目的色彩最深的組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the light color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的淺色色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the light color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為 3D 項目的淺色色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目的反白色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會套用至 3d 項目色彩最亮的組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為 3D 項目中的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為 3D 項目中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，其為桌面的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為桌面的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，該結構為現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，該結構為非現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為非現用視窗標題列的色彩漸層中最亮的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為暗灰色 (Dimmed) 文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為暗灰色文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 清單中停用的項目會以暗灰色的文字來顯示。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為選取項目的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為選取項目的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Drawing.Color>結構可能會使用清單方塊中選取項目的背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，也就是所選項目的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為選取項目的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: For example, this color is used for the text of selected items in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此色彩用於清單方塊中選取項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構是用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為用來指定熱點追蹤項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
trans-unit.target: 按一下熱點追蹤的項目會執行該項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of an inactive window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為非使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of an inactive window's border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為非現用視窗的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為非使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為非現用視窗標題列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為非使用中視窗標題列的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為非現用視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為工具提示的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為工具提示的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為工具提示的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為工具提示的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of a menu's background.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為功能表背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of a menu's background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為功能表背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，該結構為功能表列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為功能表列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，該結構為用來在功能表顯示為平面功能表時反白顯示功能表項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為用來在功能表顯示為平面功能表時反白顯示功能表項目的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of a menu's text.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為功能表文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of a menu's text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為功能表文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為捲軸的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為捲軸的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為視窗工作區 (Client Area) 中背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為視窗工作區中背景的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of a window frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為視窗框架 (Frame) 的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of a window frame.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為視窗框架的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，這個結構為視窗工作區中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，為視窗工作區中文字的色彩。
